snippet: The E.P.A. breaks down the major sources of greenhouse gas emissions from stationary fuel combustion and industrial processes, which account for more than half of the nation's heat-trapping emissions over all.
abstract: The E.P.A. breaks down the major sources of greenhouse gas emissions from stationary fuel combustion and industrial processes, which account for more than half of the nation's heat-trapping emissions over all.

headline.main: On Our Radar: The Nation's Greenhouse Gas Culprits
